General.Name: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited
General.Description: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes ready-to-drink mineral water in Thailand. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, mixed fruits, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, frozen aloe vera juice, aseptic crushed, and dehydrated pineapple core and low sugar dehydrated mango, as well as coconut water products. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages. Further, it operates various Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including company branches and franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
